channel.title: Power Outages on FinanClub

item.title: PCG
item.description: score:19 Chances: PG&E reached a milestone with 100,000 participants in its Smart Thermostat Demand Response Program. PG&E’s initiatives to combat food insecurity and promote STEM scholarships reflect positive corporate responsibility. PG&E’s upgraded rating to ‘Buy’ indicates a positive outlook by analysts. Risks: PG&E faces wildfire risks and power outage-related challenges in Northern California.
